CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Criminal proceedings;Article 6-1 - Fair hearing)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of PERSON ( NORP гарнизонный военный суд ) convicted the applicant of laundering of the proceeds of crime and sentenced him to a fine .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of ORG ( ORG окружной военный суд ) acquitted the applicant on appeal .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Presidium of ORG of ORG , on a public prosecutor ’s initiative , annulled the judgment of CARDINAL DATE by way of supervisory review and remitted the case for fresh consideration to the appeal court . The annulment was reasoned by CARDINAL main arguments : ( CARDINAL ) unresolved contradictions between witnesses’ statements pertaining to the applicant ’s criminal intent , and ( CARDINAL ) absence in the appeal judgment of a summary of the arguments presented by the prosecution during the appeal proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of ORG , acting on appeal , reversed the judgment of DATE and remitted the case for fresh consideration to the trial court .
CARDINAL . In DATE the criminal proceedings against the applicant were terminated due to decriminalization of his actions under the domestic law .
